author: Antti
text:
#CincodeMayo 
If your looking for inspiration for tomorrow; here is my list of 170 Agave Spirits that I have tasted over the past 6 years!
https://t.co/OgoDcFJW0t https://t.co/lES5EOmWjc

author: Antti
text:
Identity Blanco Tequila
https://t.co/frboiGDd8O

author: Antti
text: Ardbeg An Oa ... that leads to a balanced & floral death of medium length with notes of mint toffee, malty biscuit notes, aniseed, clove, peanut brittle, black pepper & hickory smoke.

author: Antti
text: Ardbeg An Oa ... while a rich & creamy life adds notes of chocolate limes, treacle toffee, orange, smoky tea leaves. nutmeg, cinnamon, cigar smoke, grilled artichoke, wood & golden syrup flapjacks; ...

author: Antti
text: Ardbeg An Oa ... Dr. Bill Lumsden's new 'Gathering Vat'!before being bottled at 46.6% ABV.' It has an aromatic birth with notes of smoke, charred applewood, tobacco leaf, toffee, mint, aniseed, treacle, dates, peach, banana orange cake & Honey Nut Clusters; ...

author: Antti
text: Ardbeg An Oa is a classic, elegant, 'Single Malt Scotch Whisky by Ardbeg Distillery in Islay, Scotland; maturation took place in a combination of casks including Pedro Ximénez, charred virgin oak & ex-bourbon, which were all brought together to marry in ... https://t.co/3JDHID8eC9

author: Antti
text: @chakanawines Chakana Malbec Estate Selection, 2018 ... white pepper, oak. vanilla, dark chocolate, coffee, cinnamon, toasted black walnut, cedar, tobacco, leather, graphite & smoke.

author: Antti
text: @chakanawines Chakana Malbec Estate Selection, 2018 ... a medium body adding notes of blackberry, blueberry, plum, cherry, raspberry, rhubarb, fig, violets, iris & mint; while earthy minerality, medium acidity & tannins leads to a velvety finish with notes of ...

author: Antti
text: @chakanawines Chakana Malbec Estate Selection, 2018 is an outstanding, elegant, dinner wine from Valle de Uco, Argentina aged in oak & concrete for 12 months. It opens with notes of dark & red fruits, dark flowers, nuts, herbs & spices; ... https://t.co/ZBDSN5gn7K

author: Antti
text: Identity Blanco Tequila ... It has an aromatic birth with notes of agave, earth, spice & citrus; while a smooth life adds notes of cooked agave, green bell pepper & lime; that leads to a rich & spicy death with notes of vanilla, pepper & earth.

author: Antti
text: Identity Blanco Tequila is a very good, crisp, Agave Spirit by Casa Maestri in Jalisco, Mexico cooked in an Autoclave & double distilled in Stainless steel tanks; part of the proceeds are donated to the GLAAD Foundation & other local LGBTQ charities. ... https://t.co/VyywHXgdbE

author: Antti
text: Altaland Malbec Verdot, 2021 ... dark cherry, plum, raisin, anise & violets; while stony minerality, medium acidity & soft tannins leads to a slightly creamy finish with notes of white pepper, oak, vanilla, dark chocolate, cinnamon, clove, lavender honey, leather & smoke.

author: Antti
text: Altaland Malbec Verdot, 2021 is is a very good, elegant, dinner wine from Tupungato, Argentina crafted with a blend of Malbec & Petit Verdot. It opens with notes of red & dark fruits, dark flowers, herbs & spices; a medium body adding notes of blackberry, blueberry, ... https://t.co/cpDuOEIGvW

author: Antti
text: VIRGINIE T. Rosé Champagne N.V. (85% 2010) ... pomegranate, cherry, lime, hibiscus & citrus blossom; while stony minerality, high acidity, medium-high fizz & low toast lead to a slightly creamy & delicate finish with notes of yeast, brioche & barbecue smoke.

author: Antti
text: VIRGINIE T. Rosé Champagne N.V. (85% 2010) ... 14% AOC Rouge (Pinot Noir / Pinot Meunier) bottled in April 2012 & disgorged in March 2019 & aged for 6 years. It opens with notes of red & stone fruits, white flowers, herbs & spices; a medium body adding notes of ...

author: Antti
text: VIRGINIE T. Rosé Champagne N.V. (85% 2010) ... It is crafted from a blend of 15 crus including 11 classified « Grands et Premiers Crus », 85% from the 2010 harvest & 15% of reserved wine. It is an Assemblage of 25% Pinot Noir, 55% Chardonnay, 6% Pinot Meunier & ...

author: Antti
text: VIRGINIE T. Rosé Champagne N.V. (85% 2010) is a very good, dry, special occasion wine by Virginie Taittinger  (daughter of Claude Taittinger, ex-president of Champagne Taittinger) & Catherine de Suarez d'Aulan (ex-owner of Champagne Piper-Heidsieck) in Champagne, France. ... https://t.co/HdajOq1XL2

author: Antti
text: Virginie T. Six Ans d'Âge Brut Champagne, (2007 & 2008 blend) ... while stony minerality, high acidity, medium-high fizz & low toast lead to a slightly creamy & tart finish with notes of sour cherry, yeast, biscuit & tobacco.

author: Antti
text: Virginie T. Six Ans d'Âge Brut Champagne, (2007 & 2008 blend) ...It opens with notes of citrus, dark berries, stone fruits, herbs & spices; while a full body adds notes of stewed cherry, apricot, green apple, strawberry & lime; ...

author: Antti
text: Virginie T. Six Ans d'Âge Brut Champagne, (2007 & 2008 blend) ... It is crafted with a blend of the best Grand Crus from 2008 (85%) & 2007 (15%) consisting of 70% Pinot Noir, 20% Chardonnay & 10% Pinot Meunier, bottled in March 2009, disgorged in May 2015 aged for 6 years. ...

author: Antti
text: Virginie T. Six Ans d'Âge Brut Champagne, (2007 & 2008 blend) is a very good, tart, special occasion wine by Virginie Taittinger  (daughter of Claude Taittinger, ex-president of Champagne Taittinger) & Catherine de Suarez d'Aulan (ex-owner of Champagne Piper-Heidsieck). ... https://t.co/RgK3MHN1ID
